chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
T: Type
y: SF_seq
x: SF_seq

Goal:
SF_lx (SF_cat x y) = SF_lx x ++ behead (SF_lx y)

Premises:
SF_cat = fun x y : SF_seq => {| SF_h := SF_h x; SF_t := SF_t x ++ SF_t y |} : SF_seq -> SF_seq -> SF_seq
SF_lx = fun s : SF_seq => SF_h s :: unzip1 (SF_t s) : SF_seq -> seq R
behead = fun (T : Type) (s : seq T) => match s with | [::] => [::] | _ :: s' => s' end : forall T : Type, seq T -> seq T Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope seq_scope]
SF_lx_rev : forall s : SF_seq, SF_lx (SF_rev s) = rev (SF_lx s)
seq_step_cat : forall x y : seq R, (0 < size x)%nat -> (0 < size y)%nat -> last 0 x = head 0 y -> seq_step (x ++ behead y) = Rmax (seq_step x) (seq_step y)
SF_lx_rcons : forall (s : SF_seq) (h : R * T), SF_lx (SF_rcons s h) = rcons (SF_lx s) (fst h)
SF_lx_surj : forall s s0 : SF_seq, s = s0 -> SF_lx s = SF_lx s0
SF_lx_ly_inj : forall s s0 : SF_seq, SF_lx s = SF_lx s0 -> SF_ly s = SF_ly s0 -> s = s0
SF_lx_cons : forall (h : R * T) (s : SF_seq), SF_lx (SF_cons h s) = fst h :: SF_lx s
SF_lx_nil : forall x0 : R, SF_lx (SF_nil x0) = [:: x0]
Rmax_assoc : forall x y z : R, Rmax x (Rmax y z) = Rmax (Rmax x y) z
SF_seq_bij_lx : forall (lx : seq R) (ly : seq T) (Hs : size lx = S (size ly)), SF_lx (SF_make lx ly Hs) = lx
unzip2_behead : forall s : seq (?S * ?T), unzip2 (behead s) = behead (unzip2 s) where ?S : [T : Type x : SF_seq y : SF_seq |- Type] ?T : [T : Type x : SF_seq y : SF_seq |- Type]
unzip1_behead : forall s : seq (?S * ?T), unzip1 (behead s) = behead (unzip1 s) where ?S : [T : Type x : SF_seq y : SF_seq |- Type] ?T : [T : Type x : SF_seq y : SF_seq |- Type]
behead_rev : forall s : seq ?T, behead (rev s) = rev (belast s) where ?T : [T : Type x : SF_seq y : SF_seq |- Type]
R_dist = fun x y : R => Rabs (x - y) : R -> R -> R Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope]
behead_rcons : forall (s : seq ?T) (t : ?T), (0 < size s)%nat -> behead (rcons s t) = rcons (behead s) t where ?T : [T : Type x : SF_seq y : SF_seq |- Type]
headI : forall (T : Type) (s : seq T) (x : T), rcons s x = head x s :: behead (rcons s x)
belast_cat : forall (T : Type) (x : T) (s1 s2 : seq T), seq.belast x (s1 ++ s2) = seq.belast x s1 ++ seq.belast (last x s1) s2
cat_rcons : forall (T : Type) (x : T) (s1 s2 : seq T), rcons s1 x ++ s2 = s1 ++ x :: s2
rcons_cat : forall (T : Type) (x : T) (s1 s2 : seq T), rcons (s1 ++ s2) x = s1 ++ rcons s2 x
pairmap_cat : forall (T1 T2 : Type) (f : T1 -> T1 -> T2) (x : T1) (s1 s2 : seq T1), pairmap f x (s1 ++ s2) = pairmap f x s1 ++ pairmap f (last x s1) s2
filter_cat : forall (T : Type) (a : pred T) (s1 s2 : seq T), [seq x <- s1 ++ s2 | a x] = [seq x <- s1 | a x] ++ [seq x <- s2 | a x]
scanl_cat : forall (T1 T2 : Type) (g : T1 -> T2 -> T1) (x : T1) (s1 s2 : seq T2), scanl g x (s1 ++ s2) = scanl g x s1 ++ scanl g (foldl g x s1) s2
SF_size_lx : forall s : SF_seq, size (SF_lx s) = S (SF_size s)
cat_cons : forall (T : Type) (x : T) (s1 s2 : seq T), (x :: s1) ++ s2 = x :: s1 ++ s2
SF_size_lx_ly : forall s : SF_seq, size (SF_lx s) = S (size (SF_ly s))
cat_nseq : forall (T : Type) (n : nat) (x : T) (s : seq T), nseq n x ++ s = ncons n x s
SF_seq_bij : forall s : SF_seq, SF_make (SF_lx s) (SF_ly s) (SF_size_lx_ly s) = s
allpairs_cat : forall (S : Type) (T : S -> Type) (R : Type) (f : forall x : S, T x -> R) (s1 s2 : seq S) (t : forall x : S, seq (T x)), [seq f x y | x <- s1 ++ s2, y <- t x] = [seq f x y | x <- s1, y <- t x] ++ [seq f x y | x <- s2, y <- t x]
SF_rev_0 : forall s : SF_seq, size (rev (SF_lx s)) = S (size (rev (SF_ly s)))
cat1s : forall (T : Type) (x : T) (s : seq T), [:: x] ++ s = x :: s
behead_map : forall (T1 T2 : Type) (f : T1 -> T2) (s : seq T1), behead [seq f i | i <- s] = [seq f i | i <- behead s]
